modName: Karliah Armor 2 By Hentai -CBBE3 By Nausicaa -Update
summary: Karliah Armor 2 By Hentai -CBBE3 By Nausicaa
descriptionHtml:
I can't speak english well.

I convert Hentai's Karliah2 armor to CBBE3.

It is a craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale, Leather.

It needs not original.

--------------------------------
Update 1.1 (mesh & esp)

I separate a shirt from armor.
You can wear the armor with or without the shirt.
Shirt make at jewelry.

& I repair a hole of left arm & glitter glove.

Install.

1. 1st - 1.0 install.
2. 2nd - 1.1 overwrite.
author: Nausicaa
